remarks: A quotient map in a topological group is an open map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qustgp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG Y ) ) $.
qustgpopn.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
qustgpopn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) $.
qustgpopn.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` H ) $.
qustgpopn.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> [ x ] ( G ~QG Y ) ) $.
qustgpopn $p |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ Y e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ S e. J ) -> ( F " S ) e. K ) $.
$d G x $.
$d H x $.
$d J x $.
$d K x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
